original: KJAER-, Harald Thorvald, Grosserer, Halmstad, f östrup, Danm, 31/8 85 av lantbr Vald K o hustru, f Rasmussen, gm Polly Kabell. Ag Fma J Höök, Hst, Fma Harald Kjaer & Co, Danm, o herrg Rosenheim pr Landsbro, Smal. RVO, RDDO, FFrK3kl, Skydsgårdens Ht s, RK :s SM. Dansk medb.
translated: KJAER, Harald Thorvald, Merchant, Halmstad, born in østrup, Denmark, 31/8 1885, son of farmer Vald K and wife, born Rasmussen, married to Polly Kabell. Agriculture and Trade Diploma. Managing Director of Harald Kjaer & Co, Denmark, and owner of Rosenheim Manor House in Landsbro, Småland. Royal Order of Vasa, Royal Danish Order of the Dannebrog, Knight of the Order of the Polar Star, Knight of the Swedish Order of Vasa. Danish citizenship.

structured.name: KJAER, Harald Thorvald
structured.description: Merchant, Halmstad. Son of Vald K (a farmer) and Rasmussen. Married to Polly Kabell. Managing Director of Harald Kjaer & Co, Denmark. Owner of Rosenheim Manor House in Landsbro, Småland.

awards.name: Royal Danish Order of the Dannebrog
Knight of the Order of the Polar Star
Knight of the Swedish Order of Vasa
